message.name: ERR_COMPARTMENT_XRV_NAME_ALREADY_EXISTS
message.locale: This compartment, %1s, already exists within the compartment, %2s.

message.name: ERR_COMPARTMENT_XRV_NAME_MUST_BE_ENTERED
message.locale: Compartment name must be entered.

message.name: ERR_COMPARTMENT_XFV_DATE_CLOSED_MUST_NOT_BE_LATER_THAN_TO_DATE
message.locale: The Date Closed, %1d, must be on or after the To Date of the placement within this compartment, %2s.

message.name: ERR_COMPARTMENT_FV_NAME_IS_TOO_LONG
message.locale: The value entered is too long (%1n) - maximum allowed is %2n.

message.name: ERR_COMPARTMENT_FV_DESCRIPTION_IS_TOO_LONG
message.locale: The value entered is too long (%1n) - maximum allowed is %2n.

message.name: ERR_COMPARTMENT_XFV_DATE_CLOSED_MUST_NOT_BE_EARLIER_THAN_CREATED_DATE
message.locale: The Date Closed, %1d, must be on or after the Date Created, %2d.

message.name: ERR_COMPARTMENT_FV_COMMENT_IS_TOO_LONG
message.locale: The value entered is too long (%1n) - maximum allowed is %2n.

message.name: ERR_COMPARTMENT_XRV_CANNOT_DELETE_AS_ITS_HIGHEST_IN_HIERARCHY_OF_COMPARTMENTS
message.locale: This compartment, %1s, is highest in the hierarchy of compartments, it cannot be deleted.

message.name: ERR_COMPARTMENT_XRV_CANNOT_CLOSE_AS_ITS_HIGHEST_IN_HIERARCHY_OF_COMPARTMENTS
message.locale: This compartment, %1s, is highest in the hierarchy of compartments, it cannot be closed.

message.name: ERR_COMPARTMENT_XRV_WITH_ACTIVE_PLACEMENT_CANNOT_BE_DELETED
message.locale: 'Active' placements exist within this compartment, it cannot be deleted.

message.name: ERR_COMPARTMENT_XRV_WITH_ACTIVE_PLACEMENT_CANNOT_BE_CLOSED
message.locale: This compartment has the following places with 'Active' placements without a To date: %1s. It cannot be closed.

message.name: ERR_COMPARTMENT_XRV_WITH_ACTIVE_RESERVATION_CANNOT_BE_CLOSED
message.locale: This compartment has the following places with 'Active' reservations without a To date: %1s, It cannot be closed.

message.name: ERR_COMPARTMENT_XRV_DATE_CLOSED_MUST_BE_GREATER_THAN_RESERVATION_TO_DATE
message.locale: The Date Closed, %1d, must be on or after the To Date of the reservation in places, %2s.

message.name: ERR_COMPARTMENT_XRV_WITH_ACTIVE_RESERVATION_TODATE_LATER_THAN_CLOSED_DATE_CANNOT_BE_CLOSED
message.locale: Following places have reservations with a To date later than the Date Closed : %1s, this compartment cannot be closed.

message.name: ERR_COMPARTMENT_XRV_WITH_ACTIVE_PLACEMENT_TODATE_LATER_CANNOT_BE_CLOSED
message.locale: Following places have placements with a To date later than the Date Closed : %1s, this compartment cannot be closed.

message.name: ERR_COMPARTMENT_FV_CLOSE_WITHOUT_CLOSED_DATE
message.locale: The Date Closed must be entered.

message.name: ERR_COMPARTMENT_CANNOT_MODIFIED
message.locale: This compartment has already been '%1c', it cannot be modified.

message.name: ERR_COMPARTMENT_ALREADY_CLOSED
message.locale: This compartment has already been '%1c'.

message.name: ERR_COMPARTMENT_ALREADY_CANCELLED
message.locale: This compartment has already been '%1c'.

message.name: ERR_COMPARTMENT_CANNOT_ADD_CHILD_COMPARTMENT
message.locale: This compartment, %1s, has already been '%2c', child compartment can not be created.

message.name: SAME_GENDER_ONLY
message.locale: Same Gender Only

message.name: SAME_SERVICE_ONLY
message.locale: Same Service Only

message.name: PLACEMENT_CHARACTERISTIC
message.locale: Placement Characteristic
